summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 21 November to end of Sunday 21 November GMT
description: Sunday will see overnight cloud and rain clearing in the morning, then bright but cold with scattered showers and brisk northerly winds. <br/><br/>The brisk northerly winds will give good dispersion of local emissions allied with little imported pollution.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
